thread.title: WikiLeaks about to leak CIA chief's e-mails
thread.title_full: WikiLeaks about to leak CIA chief's e-mails | News24

author: news24.com
title: WikiLeaks about to leak CIA chief's e-mails
text:
Washington - Anti-secrecy campaign WikiLeaks boasted on Wednesday that it had obtained CIA director John Brennan's personal e-mails and was about to make them public.
The claim came shortly after it was reported that a teenaged hacker had broken into the US spymaster's AOL account and had taken mails and personal data.
The FBI and Secret Service are investigating the claims, which, if true, would be a major humiliation for US intelligence after a string of major leaks.
"ANNOUNCE: We have obtained the contents of CIA Chief John Brennan's email account and will be releasing it shortly," the @Wikileaks Twitter account said.
